metadata.title: CVE-2021-47018 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:powerpc/64: Fix the definition of the fixmap areaAt the time being, the fixmap area is defined at the top ofthe address space or just below KASAN.This definition is not valid for PPC64.For PPC64, use the top of the I/O space.Because of circular dependencies, it is not possible to includeasm/fixmap.h in asm/book3s/64/pgtable.h , so define a fixed sizeAREA at the top of the I/O space for fixmap and ensure duringbuild that the size is big enough.
